item.title: Saratov project map v1.1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

Saratov project map v1.1.2 ETS2

The Saratov Ring Road has been updated
Added the city of Atkarsk
The city and region will be updated soon.

All DLC and SibirMap, Rusmap (VK) maps are required for stable operation

Update for patch 1.56

Credits: Wakich22

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: BXP SCS Baleares 156.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

BXP SCS Baleares 156.0 ETS2

– SCS map add-on expansion of Baleares
– CONTAINS: Ciutadella de Menorca, Fornells, Mahón, Ibiza, Capdepera, Sóller, Palma, Campos, Marratxí, Pollença, Santanyí
– FEATURES: Menorca, Mallorca and Ibiza
– COMPLETED: various roads and improvements
– INCOMPLETE: nothing reported
– DEPENDENCY: no
– SPECIAL THANKS: SCS & Ragner28

Credits: BXP

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Spring v4.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 24, 2025

Spring v4.0 ATS

This mod simulates Spring for American Truck Simulator.

Features
Spring weather and environment
Spring vegetation
Improved grass and trees
Increased grass density
More flowers
Spring daylight hours
Improved rain
Appropriate temperature readings

Compatibility Latest Version: ATS 1.56
Compatible with all map DLCs.

Changes in v4.0
Updated for 1.56

Recommended settings
Vegetation Detail: High
Grass Density: High

Important!!
Spring is a weather and graphics mod so other weather and graphics mods should be disabled to avoid conflicts, issues and crashes.
Spring Weather should be given a HIGH priority in Mod Manager.

Credits: Grimes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

Porsche Cayenne(’09, ’19), Panamera(’09, Sport Turismo ’17), Macan, Taycan
Ford Focus(1, 3), Mondeo Wagon, Scorpio II, Transit’10, Kuga(’13, ’20), Galaxy, EcoSport, Fiesta(’05, ’09), Ka, Puma ’20

Jaguar XJ(X350, X351), XE, F-Pace, I-Pace
Aston Martin Cygnet, DBX
Lamborghini Urus
Maserati Quattroporte(’11, ’18), Ghibli, Ghibli II, Levante
Mini Cooper Roadster, Clubman, Paceman
Lancia Delta, Thema, Ypsilon
FSC Zuk A-11
FSD Nysa 522
FSO Polonez Caro Plus, Atu Plus, Kombi, Truck Plus, 1500
Tofas Sahin, Kartal
Toyota Corolla, Yaris(’99, ’08, ’20), Aygo, Prius, Avensis, Land Cruiser(100, 200), Highlander, Hilux, C-HR, RAV4(’13, ’17, ’20)

Subaru Legacy(’05, ’10), Forester(’06, ’08, ’19), Outback, Levorg
Honda Jazz(’09, ’15, ’20), Civic(’94, ’97, ’04, ’07, ’15, ’19), Accord, CR-V(’01, ’07, ’15), HR-V, CR-Z, Insight
Mazda 2(’11, ’15), 3(’08, ’12, ’19), 6(’06, ’08, ’15), 626, Premacy, Xedos6, MX30, CX-5
Suzuki SX4, Liana, Swift
Nissan Micra(’11, ’17), Primera(P11 Wagon, P12 Sedan, Wagon), Navara(D22, D40), Juke, Leaf, Tiida, Murano, Qashqai, Patrol, X-Trail, Pathfinder, Maxima QX
Mitsubishi Colt, Lancer(VIII, IX), Pajero, Outlander, L200, i-MiEV
Hyundai i20, ix20, i30(’07, ’17), ix35, Tucson, Getz, Kona, Santa Fe, Sonata, Veloster
Infiniti Q50, Q60, Q70

Man TGE
Kia Sportage(’10, ’18), Carnival, Soul, Picanto(’11, ’17), Stinger, Optima(’11, ’16), Niro, Sorento, Carens
Tesla Model S, Model X, Model 3
Chevrolet Spark, Aveo, Lacetti
Dodge Caliber
Jeep Grand Cherokee
RAM 1500
Chrysler PT Cruiser
17 trailers for cars
police cars for 11 countries

All standalone, works on any maps.
Included real 3D logos for default cars and over 600 skins for different vans.
Models of other authors: Dacia Logan (Srele), MB Vito, W210, VW Passat B5, Renault Kangoo (Alexx_Os), some skins by IJ’s Mods.
Compatible with all my packs.
For version 1.56.x

Version 21.8.9 – fixed errors with license plates

Credits: Jazzycat

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
